    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the model for the chat app-level MVC system

    • connectTo

      public String connectTo(String remoteHost)
      Manual connection to a Registry to retrieve and process a stub from it. Connects to the Registry at the given address, retrieves a stub from it, then delegates to connectToStub() to process the stub.
      Parameters:
      remoteHost - The IP address of the remote Registry
      Returns:
      A status message string

    • connectToStub

      public void connectToStub(IInitialAppConnection stub)
      Process the newly acquired stub. This is the method that the discovery model uses in "Client" or "Client + Server" usage modes
      Parameters:
      stub - The newly acquired stub

    • connectToDyad

      public void connectToDyad(INamedAppConnection remoteDyad)
      Adds dyad to set of connection dyads and sends to the contained remote connection the current set of connections.
      Parameters:
      remoteDyad - dyad containing connection stub and name

    • sendMsgToRemoteUser

      public void sendMsgToRemoteUser(String text)
      Sends a string message to the connected compute engine using the IRemoteTaskViewAdapter STUB received from the engine server. This message should also be echoed to the local user interface.
      Parameters:
      text - The message to be sent

      public void checkWinner()
      Checks for winner of or draw game based on the size of the map of the teams. Game continues if not found.

      Eliminate team from map by using false value in map
      Parameters:
      uuid - id of team to eliminate

      public void joinServerRoom(INamedRoomID selectedRoom)
      Request, in the form of a message, to the server to join one of its rooms
      Parameters:
      selectedRoom - the room the client wishes to join
